event.wizard.1: It is time for you to learn the ways of magic.
event.wizard.2: I have... adjusted the Yoba altar in Pierre's shop for you to use.
event.wizard.3: I will teach you the basic of Arcane magic, but the rest you must discover on your own.
event.wizard.4: The Arcane 'Analyze' spell can be used to discover most spells. However, certain, more powerful spells must be discovered in other ways.
event.wizard.5: Every school of magic has 3 normal spells, and a fourth ancient spell. Even I do not know where these spells lie.
event.wizard.6: To help you get started, I will give you a hint. Try using Analyze on your watering can.
event.wizard.7: (To start casting a spell, press Q. Then press 1-4 to choose the spell.)
event.wizard.8: (Press TAB to switch between spell sets.)
event.wizard.9: (These controls can be adjusted in Magic's config file.)
tv.analyzehints.name: Magical Analytics
tv.analyzehints.1: Looking to use magic to work around the farm? Try analyzing your tools.
tv.analyzehints.2: Need a quick escape? I wonder if some boots will give you some inspiration.
tv.analyzehints.3: Sunlight is pretty nice, but not always available. I wonder if artificial lights can be recreated?
tv.analyzehints.4: Some basic minerals seem to contain some magical energy.
tv.analyzehints.5: The other day a meteor fell in my backyard. It seemed really mysterious.
tv.analyzehints.6: Coffee is delicious. Why not recreate its effects with a spell?
tv.analyzehints.7: The other day I saw someone sprout roots from the ground and keep a monster from moving, almost like a crop.
tv.analyzehints.8: I bet you could shoot a blast of ice to slow something down. I wonder where you could study ice...?
tv.analyzehints.9: I saw an dark altar in someone's house the other day. Well, I say 'house'. It was more like a hut.
tv.analyzehints.10: Health potions sure are inconvenient to carry around. Maybe we can heal ourselves with magic?
tv.analyzehints.11: Most people use ladders to descend underground, but I saw one person cast a spell and zip straight through the floor.
tv.analyzehints.12: I saw someone cast a spell to regain mana!? It looked like it hurt. Rumor has it they learned this technique while fishing for Lava Eels.

 Higher levels are larger and more fierce.
